title: Slain Victorville high school football player remembered. 'His energy was infectious'
dc:creator: Gregory Yee
description: Richard Reed, 17, was found shot to death Sunday night in Victorville. At playoffs, his team and others will wear helmet stickers in his honor.
content:encoded: Richard Reed, 17, was found shot to death Sunday night in Victorville. At playoffs, his team and others will wear helmet stickers in his honor.

media:content.media:description: Silverado's Richard Reed running against Granite Hills during their game in Apple Valley CA on Friday October 7, 2022. (James Quigg, for the Daily Press)
